SELECT a.`id` AS id, a.`clientType` AS clientType, a.gameId AS gameId, bg.gameName AS gameName, a.`zoneId` AS zoneId, a.`platformId` AS platformId, SUM(a.regUsers) AS regUsers, SUM(a.roleDevices)/SUM(a.regDevices) AS conversionRate, SUM(b.roleLogins) AS activeUsers, SUM(IF(b.keepRole1=-1, 0, b.keepRole1)) AS keepRole1, SUM(IF(b.keepRole3=-1, 0, b.keepRole3)) AS keepRole3, SUM(IF(b.keepRole7=-1, 0, b.keepRole7)) AS keepRole7, SUM(IF(b.keepRole15=-1, 0, b.keepRole15)) AS keepRole15, SUM(IF(b.keepRole30=-1, 0, b.keepRole30)) AS keepRole30, SUM(b.roleEstablishs) AS roleEstablishs, SUM(a.payAmount) AS payAmount, SUM(a.newUserPayAmount) AS incPayAmount, SUM(a.newUserPays) AS incPayUsers, SUM(a.payUsers) AS payUsers, a.`statDate` FROM s_zone_platform_daily a JOIN b_game bg ON bg.id=a.gameId JOIN s_role_daily b ON a.gameId=b.gameId AND a.zoneId=b.zoneId AND a.platformId=b.platformId AND a.clientType=b.clientType AND a.statDate=b.statDate
GROUP BY a.`statDate` ORDER BY a.statDate ASC
